geo

Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • apcsa.franklin.inheritance.geo.Polygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Shape2D
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rectangle, RegularHexagon, Triangle

    public abstract class Polygon
extends java.lang.Object
implements Shape2D
    This class represents a Polygon which is a 2D shape. All polygons have a number of vertices and draw and fill methods. We can easily calculate the perimeter of a polygon, but we leave finding the area up to its subclasses which use difference formulas. Implements: Shape2D Subclasses: Rectangle, Triangle, Square.
